title: 求一本书的give指令
author: 黑茶RGO
txt_content:
版本为1.11.2
要求作者为“Black_Tea_RGO”
标题为“title”
书页面前三行分别为“内容1”“内容2”“内容3”
然后空一行
接着是深绿色字体（带下划线）的“内容4”且点击后触发“指令1”
再下面一行是深紫色字体（同样带下划线）的“内容5”且点击后触发“指令2”

有谁能给出符合要求的give指令
我需要直接给指令，不要给我软件或教程，且指令内的上述要求处（“内容1~5”和“指令1~2”）请标红，我需要自己修改


有谁会的发一下，谢谢了

replies.author: ⊙v⊙
replies.txt_content:
你这...怎么那么懒

/give @p minecraft:written_book 1 0 
{author:"Black_Tea_RGO",
title:"title",
pages:[

"{"text":"",
        "extra":[
        {"text":"内容1"},
        {"text":"\\n"},
        {"text":"内容2"},
        {"text":"\\n"},
        {"text":"内容3"},
        {"text":"\\n"},
        {"text":"\\n"},
        {"text":"内容4","color":"dark_green","underlined":true,"clickEvent":{"action":"run_command","value":"/say 指令1"}},
        {"text":"\\n"},
        {"text":"内容5","color":"dark_purple","underlined":true,"clickEvent":{"action":"run_command","value":"/say 指令2"}},
        {"text":"\\n"},
        {"text":"内容6","color":"dark_red","underlined":true,"clickEvent":{"action":"run_command","value":"/setblock -3 5 -1 minecraft:redstone_block"}}
        ]
}"

]}复制代码

replies.author: xuan3er3
replies.txt_content: /give @p minecraft:written_book 1 0 {title:"title",author:"Black_Tea_RGO",pages:["{\"text\":\"\",\"extra\":[{\"text\":\"内容1\\n内容2\\n内容3\\n\\n\"},{\"text\":\"内容4\",\"color\":\"green\",\"underlined\":\"true\",\"clickEvent\":{\"action\":\"run_command\",\"value\":\"指令2\"}},{\"text\":\"\\n\",\"color\":\"green\",\"underlined\":\"true\"},{\"text\":\"内容5\",\"color\":\"dark_purple\",\"underlined\":\"true\",\"clickEvent\":{\"action\":\"run_command\",\"value\":\"指令2\"}}]}"]}

replies.author: xuan3er3
chyx
replies.txt_content: /give chenyuxuan minecraft:written_book 1 0 {pages:["[\"内容1\\n\",\"内容2\\n\",\"内容3\\n\",\"\\n\",{\"text\":\"内容4\",\"color\":\"dark_green\",\"underlined\":true,\"clickEvent\":{\"action\":\"run_command\",\"value\":\"指令1\"}},\"\\n\",{\"text\":\"内容5\",\"color\":\"dark_purple\",\"underlined\":true,\"clickEvent\":{\"action\":\"run_command\",\"value\":\"指令2\"}},\"\\n\"]"],author:"chenyuxuan",title:"title"}

replies.author: ⊙v⊙
replies.txt_content:
1.11.2的话其实这样就可以了...
/give @p minecraft:written_book 1 0 
{author:"Black_Tea_RGO",
title:"title",
pages:[

"{text:'',
        extra:[
        {text:'内容1'},
        {text:'\n'},
        {text:'内容2'},
        {text:'\n'},
        {text:'内容3'},
        {text:'\n\n'},
        {text:'内容4',color:dark_green,underlined:true,clickEvent:{action:run_command,value:'/say 指令1'}},
        {text:'\n'},
        {text:'内容5',color:dark_purple,underlined:true,clickEvent:{action:run_command,value:'/say 指令2'}}
        ]
}"

]}复制代码
.
不过还是严谨下的好...
/give @p minecraft:written_book 1 0 
{author:"Black_Tea_RGO",
title:"title",
pages:[

"{"text":"",
        "extra":[
        {"text":"内容1"},
        {"text":"\\n"},
        {"text":"内容2"},
        {"text":"\\n"},
        {"text":"内容3"},
        {"text":"\\n"},
        {"text":"\\n"},
        {"text":"内容4","color":"dark_green","underlined":true,"clickEvent":{"action":"run_command","value":"/say 指令1"}},
        {"text":"\\n"},
        {"text":"内容5","color":"dark_purple","underlined":true,"clickEvent":{"action":"run_command","value":"/say 指令2"}}
        ]
}"

]}复制代码
都那么明显了,还标什么红...
■■■
/give @p minecraft:written_book 1 0 
{author:"Black_Tea_RGO",
title:"title",
pages:[

"{\"text\":\"\",
        \"extra\":[
        {\"text\":\"内容1\"},
        {\"text\":\"\\n\"},
        {\"text\":\"内容2\"},
        {\"text\":\"\\n\"},
        {\"text\":\"内容3\"},
        {\"text\":\"\\n\"},
        {\"text\":\"\\n\"},
        {\"text\":\"内容4\",\"color\":\"dark_green\",\"underlined\":true,\"clickEvent\":{\"action\":\"run_command\",\"value\":\"/say 指令1\"}},
        {\"text\":\"\\n\"},
        {\"text\":\"内容5\",\"color\":\"dark_purple\",\"underlined\":true,\"clickEvent\":{\"action\":\"run_command\",\"value\":\"/say 指令2\"}}
        ]
}"

]}
■■■

还有  你这9级是水上来的么...

replies.author: 黑茶RGO
replies.txt_content:
⊙v⊙ 发表于 2017-8-4 06:09
1.11.2的话其实这样就可以了...

.
之前忘记了，麻烦再在后面加个深红色的内容6对应的指令"/setblock -3 5 -1 minecraft:redstone_block"
谢谢了

replies.author: xiaoXG
replies.txt_content: 一个个复制的....，楼主你还是自己拿本书弄好了
